testsuite.name: PUT /me/profile

testcase.name: should return 400 PROFILE_UPDATE_FAILED when update service throws IllegalArgumentException
should update profile for authenticated user and return 204
should return 400 PROFILE_UPDATE_FAILED when not authenticated
